alert.note: Alert for Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 05 at 10:18PM AKDT until April 07 at 12:00AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM AKDT WEDNESDAY THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Portions of the south-central Inner Channels including Wrangell, Kake, Coffman Cove, and Point Baker. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Confidence in high winds occurring has lowered due to latest models showing the storm tracking more offshore. The outer coast areas of Kuiu Island and northern Prince of Wales remain the most at risk. The forecast will continue to be monitored.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island
